name: Willie Marsh
text: It has older  game

name: Jaideep Honavar
text:
We had our 5 yr olds birthday party here and it was a complete success. The staff was on point and the manager made sure our guests had a wonderful time.
More than half our guests didn't show up and the manager adjusted the price down on the final bill. I was not expecting that and it made the whole experience even better.

name: Beth Moffett
text: Staff was friendly, facilities were clean, good air flow with the fans blowing. Not too crowded. Took our 2 year old and he had a blast.

name: amida mansueto
text: The staff is very good! The place is amazing everything turns out great! My son and his friends enjoyed the party! I’ll definitely will recommend this place..this is a good place for a bday party celebration.

name: Bradley Jones
text: Awesome venue for a birthday party! Kids had a great time!

name: Beau
text: Great staff. My son had a blast. Owner is very kind and helpful. We will be back.

name: FOODIE FREAK
text: The staff was great and my nieces party was a success💕

name: Jacque Hagood
text: The grandkids had a blast 😀

name: Marquita Franklin
text: Had excellent fun, great customer service.....very maintained and clean... Wonderful place for your kids party

name: Lynn Holder
text: Had my daughter's birthday party here. Everything was great. The staff was very nice and helpful.

name: Kare Glasscock
text: Went here a neighbor's daughters Birthday party, there was NOT enough seats for all the adults to sit in. The establishment SMELT like old nasty carpet. The place definitely needs a good facelift.

name: Renee Adams
text: Great for kids parties... Nice Staff. Private room for cake and presents.

name: Ray
text:
My daughter went to a party here about a month ago and had a blast.

When it came time for her birthday party, she wanted to have here.

From someone who's attended a party as a guest and has hired pump it up, I can tell you the experience has been highly positive both times.

I love the way they take the kids around to to different rooms to keep them occupied. I also love the fact that the party guides bend over hand and foot to make sure you party is happy. They also minimize the work of the parent.

I basically brought in the party supplies and they took care of the rest.

Great attitude and a great experience; would definitely use again.

name: Danella Taylor
text: Kids had fun, but too young to understand the aftermath. After all monies was been taken, We heard the doors lock behind us. 2 minutes later,  police was touring the parking area, you could feel the "get off and out of the area quick". I feel this is NOT a place for our kids.  They will understand this as they grow older

name: Vanessa skripko
text: These pictures aren't all accurate. The party we attended had a slide only. After the kids get done jumping in the really hot room, you go to a slightly less hot cafeteria set up type area to celebrate. There are pictures that are adorable that were taken while the kids are playing. You don't get to keep them you just can view them for the short bit they are playing on the screen. My daughter and the birthday girl thought a better party would be held where there were more things than a slide. Surge and skyzone were both mentioned when the next has a party. I would say lessoned learned wish we knew just won't come back.

name: Lady Liam
text: A free day to let little kids run around for two hours? You bet! If you have a small child who likes to pretend your house in a jungle gym, this is the place to go. Two large rooms, plenty of space for everyone, and did I mention they have free days and stuff for birthdays?

name: Roy ORR
text: Fun place for kids to come play and have birthday parties. My son and his class had a BLAST. Thanks to the staff.

name: Joe Pickren
text: No need to do business with someone who discriminates against those with disabilities.

name: Angela Hutchens
text: Thank you for being the most attentive staff and with the best birthday party.

name: Vanessa skripko
text: These pictures aren't all accurate. The party we attended had a slide only. After the kids get done jumping in the really hot room, you go to a slightly less hot cafeteria set up type area to celebrate. There are pictures that are adorable that were taken while the kids are playing. You don't get to keep them you just can view them for the short bit they are playing on the screen. My daughter and the birthday girl thought a better party would be held where there were more things than a slide. Surge and skyzone were both mentioned when the next has a party. I would say lessoned learned wish we knew just won't come back.

name: Erin McCoy
text: Kids loved it!  But there was trash on the floor in the second room.  But the actual Inflatables were in good condition and were clean. The kids had a blast. And the prices are pretty good

name: Angela Hutchens
text: Thank you for being the most attentive staff and with the best birthday party.

name: Ola L
text: Had a birthday party here.  The staff did a good job, however, I wouldn't do itagain. NOT really our vibe.

name: Preston Armes
text: Everything was great. They even opened up another area about halfway through. This gave the kids even more choices.

name: Bradford Monk
text: Needs more parking. Staff nice but didn't seem very personable - young and inexperienced. Inflatables we're big and fun but seemed old and worn out. Almost no options for 2 year olds. Party rooms were a good size and clean. Bounce rooms smelled very sweaty.

name: Maureen Adams
text: Great prices to pay for the happiness PuMp It Up can give you and your kids. Low prices on their days of fun. You can make party reservations or just do daily visits the prices are low enough to maintain a fun day with an added bonus of having money left over to go out to eat.

name: Erica Dubose
text: We really enjoyed ourselves kids and Adults and the Staff is wonderful thank you so much.

name: Jessica ann
text: Our daughter had her 6th bday party here & it was a hit! Both friends and family bragged to me about how fun the party was, how organized it was, & how great the staff at pump it up took over and hosted the party.  The young staff at pump it up do an excellent job!! They did everything! Cut the cake, passed out pizza & drinks, played with the children, took pictures of the party, & even helped my daughter open her presents. The only thing I had to do was drive the car up & load them.  Amazing party experience & I’ve had parties for my kids at different surrounding locations & this was by far the best experience. The only downfall, it is a bit pricey, but the kids have a blast & in the end it was totally worth it to save a few months for this top notch experience. Thanks pump it up Trussville!

name: Olin Graham
text: I had a great time with my grandchildren, enjoyed Pump it up and will surely recommend it to all my friends. Though I'm still out of breath, I really enjoyed Pump it up.

name: Jessica ann
text: Our daughter had her 6th bday party here & it was a hit! Both friends and family bragged to me about how fun the party was, how organized it was, & how great the staff at pump it up took over and hosted the party.  The young staff at pump it up do an excellent job!! They did everything! Cut the cake, passed out pizza & drinks, played with the children, took pictures of the party, & even helped my daughter open her presents. The only thing I had to do was drive the car up & load them.  Amazing party experience & I’ve had parties for my kids at different surrounding locations & this was by far the best experience. The only downfall, it is a bit pricey, but the kids have a blast & in the end it was totally worth it to save a few months for this top notch experience. Thanks pump it up Trussville!

name: Miranda Byrd
text: My only real complaint is my kids love to play with other kids but here they were by themselves. Their open play hours are super random too.

name: Salil Behara
text: Nothing much to do. The kids were bored after the first 30 mins. The Pehlam location in bigger and better. Great people at the front desk though.

text: This is a very nice & comfortable venue that is designed specifically for children's birthday parties & activities. I highly recommend this location for your kid's next function.

I was more then pleased and I would highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a well grounded party place for your child(ren)....I will definitely be back!

text: Worst experience ever they rushed us plus the party was booked for 4:30 but they closed at 6 I felt like it was a waste of money plus the staff was very rude I will never book a party here ever again

name: Milvia Forney
text: Sarah is a rockstar! This was my first time working with Sarah, and she nailed it. She is easy to work with, and was always two steps ahead in planning and seeing my vision for the party. Simply amazing. Kudos for Sarah for making my little girl's experience an unforgettable experience.

text: Awesome, caring staff and fun play area. They offer classes and birthday parties, open play, and drop-off.

name: cortney Stanfield
text: Wonderful place for the little ones

name: Hollie Davison
text: I purchased a party pack and they did such a great job with making everything smooth and enjoyable!  The pizza and food was really great better than expected! Kimmy, sorry if i didn't spell right, she was our party coordinator and she was so polite and helpful with polishing everything up and making the rest of the visit a hit for our party guest!!! We will try to make this more then a yearly thing for any party we hope to plan for the Future! There was another employee up front that he was very helpful, they where having some computer issues but he used other means to speed up the finalisation on us checking out and he was practically the cherry on the top for the rest of the event! Wish i knew his name to  Personally thank him for his and Kimmy's exceptional service!!!

name: Kevin Anderson
text: Lots to do here! We came mainly for the wipeout course. Unfortunately,  it wasn't working, but the boys still had fun.

name: Sdh Houser
text: Too crowded no social distance and kids are rude called my autistic son names he was sad. Cancel my membership that was our first time going. Not a kid friendly environment. Do not go here. Oh yeah fights broke out so we left. Horrible first visit and LAST!!!

name: Carla McCluney
text: This place is awesome! Very friendly staff and clean. My 7 year old son loves this place.

name: Paula Winslett
text:
It was awful 😢. Went for my grandson's birthday party . two granddaughters 15 and 13, were playing dodge ball  with a group of girls and they started calling my girls names and then physically attacked them. They were not doing anything but playing.  Staff did nothing to help  except follow all of us around and more or less walk us to the door.  I will Not GO THERE AGAIN.  There was nothing but children even working there and they didn't care what was going on. 😕
Sherif was outside, they were no help either.  I had to get all my kids out of there, before a fight with the whole place erupted..

name: Barbara
text: Went for a birthday party for my niece, it was a lot to do and the children had fun but there need to be a limit on capacity or something. The place was full and there wasn't any social distancing or mask being worn by the majority of guest. There was plenty of staff available but none asking people to distance, wear mask or limiting how many children/teenagers can be in vertian areas at a time.

name: Jennifer Townsend
text: Celebrated all three of my kids birthdays here this year. Staff was wonderful, accommodating, friendly and respectful. Highly recommend.

name: Brandi Hammond
text: It was sooooo crowded. There were a bunch of teenagers running the place that didn't care about the safety of the kids there or anything. Fights were breaking out left and right. The food stand ran out of change and just told me they had to keep it when I asked if I was getting my change back. I had to go up front to ask for it. The place was a wreck with trash everywhere. It was so disorganized. And when you use the self kiosk you don't find out until all the way at the end that you have to go up front to get the basic packages. The online form didn't work either.

name: Amber Flores
text: We had a blast! Very pricey but so much fun.

name: Darryl Kirkland
text: Great experience for my daughter. Food could be better for the cost but other than that, great place. Definitely great for the lil tumblers lol

text: The fact that I felt like a little kid with my kids was very fun WE WILL BE BACK!!!

text: Was great and fun. Way over priced on drinks but kinda figured

*my only concern was that Noone took the temperatures of entering visitors. This was one of the reasons I allowed my kids to go was their stringent covid policies. It was not very busy, but for future I hope this is still being used.

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

text: Place was very dirty, trash everywhere, dirty diaper in floor, over crowded. Over all bad experience. Been here plenty of times before and it has never been that bad.

text: My girls love this place. If your kids need to burn off energy and you have time to kill, this is a good place to go. Go early this place can get pretty busy.

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

name: Donna Kusiak
text: we had a "Lock Out" with our youth group.  they willing opened late at night and were super friendly!

name: Randy Hicks
text: The park is great for kids. The staff were on the phone every time you needed assistance. Had to wait for the concessions person to finish his text and get a drink of his slushy before taking my order. The guy running the ropes course was not harnessed in and almost fell while helping a child. There are not enough sanitation stations. There are no staff members monitoring the play area there were Christmas and asks using foul language around going children. Overall the facility is nice the staff is lacking in responsibility and needs adult supervision.

name: Jamie Deherty
text: The staff was great, I felt like my kids were safe and my family enjoyed the whole experience.

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

name: the pain theory
text: I have a membership here and I go alot fun place and the staff is nice. Just watched the dodge ball court the moto is if you can dodge a wrench you can dodge a ball😄

name: Latasihahy!ndhcbxn Smith
text: Too crowded and no one taking precautions for covid-19. No place for younger kids to enjoy because the older ones are taking over!

name: Brandy Wickliffe
text:
My family has been going to Trussville Urban Air since they opened and as a surprise for my sons 8th birthday we booked him a party on 12/4. I am absolutely appalled at the staffing of this establishment. My son and his friend (both 10) were physically assaulted by a group of teenagers (15). Now I know, kids can be wild but I had several adults that I didnt know run to find me when this happened. My older nephew attempted to intervene as these children were stomping on my sons stomach and forcibly holding him under the ball pit. I was informed by multiple adult witnesses who confirmed this was in fact what was happening. When my nephew tried to tell the boys to leave my 10 year old son alone the boys ADULT father bowed up on my nephew making threats yelling in his face. My nephew is also A CHILD. There were ZERO staff members to be found and when I was finally able to talk to a manager (Tiffany) I was disrespected and cut off mid sentence. She refused to hear my concerns. I was completely rational and calm as I was just trying to speak with someone in charge and have the cameras viewed so I could find out what actions should be taken. When asked to speak to someone above her she refused to give me any name or contact info and WALKED AWAY mid sentence. We have always enjoyed bringing our children here, but if I am paying for a party that large with that many children I would expect my guests to be SAFE. I would love to speak with someone above the managers on staff due to the absolute lack of professionalism they displayed. It is not my intention to be tacky or tasteless but I am shocked at how children being visibly injured was met by "management". This establishment should be well staffed for the level of children it sees on a nightly basis and all of the children should feel and BE safe. Staff members do not supervise in any way, like other trampoline parks do. spending close to 500$ for a 2 hour party, my child and his friend were jumped on kicked and bullied by 5 teenage boys and the manager (Tiffany) didn't even offer an apology or ask the children if they were okay.. nothing. My experience was awful. Tiffany would not hear my concerns, would not review the cameras and let me know the severity of the situation. Due to this, 5 kids left my sons party and I was left feeling a HUGE lack of customer service. The chosen manager of this establishment should put children first, listen to the concerns of paying patrons and have solutions. She was the most disrespectful manager I have ever met. I had my  son and his friend upset right in front of her and she barely looked at them, didn't ask if they were okay. She walked away.

after reaching out to an owner, I was not offered any resolution or an offer of looking at the camera. Simply "I'll speak to tiffany about this" and s"orry this happened". finally got the apology that should have happened days before but too little too late. what resolution would you expect if this happened at a party you were hosting and it was your children being hurt?

great leadership comes from the top. get it together. while I know these specific incidents are isolated, you should know how to handle these situations and so should your staff. view  the cameras, even if the patron cannot. have a resolution.

name: Lesa Roush
text:
**Edited to ad more review** party booked for 11-1 said I could arrive 15mins prior for set up yet they don't open their doors till 11, they also fail to disclosethat the premium activities I paid for for the older kids don'topen till noon, when I booked 11-1, kids only got an hour to play on the rock wall, zip line and ceiling corse** very disappointed, will probably not book anymore parties here in the future.

Very fun but for the price you pay which is high, they shouldn't limit it to 2hrs or lower the price to reflect the 2hr limit. Also the employees should not be sitting around talking bad about other employees where customers can hear them. Very unprofessional. Have a party booked and even though I booked online and placed the pizza order they still require you to call the Thursday before your party and you can never get anyone to answer the phone, so I left messages that have gone unanswered and her party is tomorrow. Hopefully they got my message and the pizzas will be ready. Very disappointed so far with the service.

name: Valerie Gaines
text: I really enjoyed myself, I will be back again.

name: Ashley Bensel
text: Nice environment. Clean. Wasn't crowded. Couldn't give a five start due to lack of staff being fully present. Staff was sitting on phone instead of assisting children with the zip line.

name: Michael Moorer
text: I went for my nieces birthday celebration and to my dismay, there were no social distancing or masks being enforced. Almost no kids had on masks and there didnt seem to be a capacity limit placed on number of people entering the bulding. Do NOT book your birthday in this in door location. Aside from that, the area is great for kids to play and have fun.

name: Gabe Johnson
text: Very fun good food just asked about the height  so you don't over pay

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

name: Karie Smith
text: Sunday, I went to a party for one of my friend’s 7 year old son and I was so impressed. The concession wait wasn’t too long and the check in process wasn’t hard at all. Our party host, I think her name was Amelia, was so awesome and was so attentive to our needs. She told us that she was only 17 but her maturity level was so high she could have fooled me. I will definitely be having my daughter’s birthday at this location. The only thing I wish is that the staff would wear name tags to make it more personal.

text: Always an awesome adventure for kids.  I'm concerned though because of children who arent wearing masks. Only because of this issue,  i will rate it 3/5 stars.

text: Chile the cap in these comments is killing be buh anyways it’s not all that y’all really doing to much like nobody even use the word blast anymore but anyways y’all need to update y’all thing cause I’m good and well y’all don’t close that early

text: Favorite place to jump. My son loves it.

name: jim bush
text: Kids LOVE this place. Big kids seem to love it to

name: Lee Rosser
text: Great for kids, not great if you want covid.  Saw most employees not wearing masks, and the temperature taking station was unmanned.  The covid prevention here was a joke.

name: Christy McGowan
text: Can Adults have Birthday Parties here? I seriously cannot say enough great things about this place. Our host Joshua made sure we had everything we needed. There are tons of activities. I did the zip line myself about 50 times. Prices were great, food was great. No time limit which was a plus. The staff were all very courteous and helpful. My six year old is still talking about it. Thank you for making her birthday the best one yet. Lets just say this...I don't have too many pictures from that day, this is the kind of place that makes you put away your phone and live life.

name: Crystal Tindle
text: Great place and nice employees. Tons of fun for several hours

name: Eloise Jones
text: Lots to do kids grandbabies had a ball

name: Shadow 5
text: The Workers here should complain...  nothing can be easy when it comes to handling operations . The staff can not remember where a child is in line or in some areas notice anything at all. Larger groups of children can overtake any attraction at the point of entry,  Especially  The climbing area, the gate opens outward and there is no designated line area so the newbies coming up get shuffled with others that have been waiting. And if you clarify to the staff. We’ll if your me , you get completely ignored this is Because the lack of effort on part of this business and its owners to structure and design each area, so a child can follow the most basic and obvious plans and not just demand or require STAFF to have to sort it all out while in progress , as they have so much to do already, assuring the kids are safe and having fun on the play equipment.. In conclusion maybe structure helps the staff to do a better job , it’s not their fault

name: Gerri Betts
text: Great experience! The whole family enjoyed it. The food was delicious. The staff was very helpful and professional. Great place for the whole family to enjoy. We will definitely tell others to come and we will be back.

name: Katie A.
text:
we attended a 12 yr old's birthday party here and it was great! There are so many things to do that even when they were super crowded and busy there was always something to do. There's a mini obstacle course over a ball pit. There are various trampoline areas designated for jumping. dodgeball, basketball etc.  a balance beam over a foam pit for kids battling to knock each other off..There are areas that are for small children only as well.   there are massage chairs spread out about a place for the parents to sit in if you put money in for a massage. (Don't get carried away .. No matter how much you enjoy it... If you do more than 20minutes, your body is probably going to be sore the next day or two) for a little extra money there is also a rock climbing wall and a zip line that will send you across the building to one side and then whip you around back to where you started from instead of just going straight across so that was really cool. There's an area where you can be tethered above for safety but being able to walk across small platforms or climb across a web of rope... they're just a lot of things to do. I saw the children of all ages they're having a good time. ( my 15 yr old going through one of those phases where nothing entertains him... Actually had his face light up .. so I paid for him to play outside of the party.
It can be a bit expensive covering the person and then buying their special socks required.. but the kids really did enjoy it so it's worth it.

name: Ola L
text:
It's fine on weekdays- it gets a little too full for us on weekends.  Both of my kids are able to play there - a preschooler and an early elementary kid.
I feel like it becomes a little rough for them on weekends.

name: adrienne miller
text: So much fun and great customer service

name: Chris McGill
text: Great place staff was awesome will be going back

name: Patty Davis
text: Great and fun.

name: Myrtle Adams-Davis
text: Pizza is AWESOME! My daughter had a ball for her Birthday Party at Urban Air in Trusville..THANKS  TO ALL.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tashara Johnson
text: My niece had a birthday party here and the food and service was super Great!!!! When I say the customer service was AMAZING!!!! Lord this young lady really helped me with my son today... He keep running to her department but he wasn't tall enough she never once got mad or had an attitude she just loved on him!!!! I didn't get her name but I hope someone in management sees this and let her know how thankful I was for her help!!!! I found us a place to come on the weekends!!! Thanks again to all the wonderful staff!!!

name: Rebekah Morris
text: Highly disappointed with the staffing, there wasn’t enough workers to regulate each zone, too many kids in one area at a time , for the 7 and under zone big kids were all over it as wear my 5 year old was too scared to jump for fear of getting trampled! Bathrooms were not clean toilet paper all over the place no soap no paper towels had to wait too long for a drink at the concession stand!!! We were there last year when first opened and it was super nice! Plenty of workers and smiling faces, yesterday was a completely different experience, it seemed like kids running the place were  more worried about what they looked like then doing their job!! Over crowded!! Will not be returning.....also too many people sitting in the massage chairs taking up space while they are beeping the ENTIRE time!! Very very annoying!!!! We were there over two hours and it was the SAME people that never moved from them!!!!!

resp.text: We are so sorry for your experience.  We hope you give us another shot.  We are working our best to improve the experience and cleanliness.  Thank you for your comments.

name: Heather Macias
text: Great place for kids. They have a zipline and rock climbing wall that my daughter loved besides the trampolines. Good place to have a birthday party. Stays pretty busy

name: Jessica collins
text: Food horrible cold and nothing served in a timely matter will never spend my money again

name: Matt Besecker
text:
The Pros:

Lots of things for a 6 year old to do for hours.

Reasonably priced for what it is.

Food is good.

Facility was clean and in good shape.

The Cons:

One of the main attractions “The Ropes” was not working and no discount was made to reflect this for the ultimate package.

The entire staff looked like they hate life. They play amongst themselves and give very little attention to the children. Parents had to whistle and wave down staff to unhook their kids at the rock wall area because the staff were too busy huddled up together talking. When they were actually doing their job, they all had sad faces like they had been yelled at for something 5 minutes ago.

Please retrain your staff.

name: Kamala Burks
text: I went two days ago to book look into booking a party for my daughter's birthday.  I was pleasantly overwhelmed by the attention my daughter and I received. Re'Yanna helped me reserve our party. She went out of her way by helping me find the best fit for our needs and budget.  Both my daughter and I are looking forward to returning for her upcoming party.  Thank you Re'yanna!!

name: Beverly Craft
text: Took 2 nephews (10 and 8) and 4 adults on a Wednesday. The boys played until the place closed. Great deal for 4 players with all-access and pizza (Yum), drinks and ice cream. We had a wonderful  time. My mother said this was the best family place she has seen. Clean, plenty of friendly staff, a cool u-shaped zipline, 3 layer trampoline, multiple types of rock walls, arcade games and AWESOME ninja courses. Great place for parties and something for all ages.

name: Dennis Brooks
text: Great place for young people to burn of a lot of energy and they have snacks and drinks but their a little steep but it's family and kid oriented co have what fun you can.

name: Ashley R
text: We always have a great time with our kids here.

name: Andrea Mixon
text: Lots of fun for the kids..

name: Mark Miller
text: We went there to ride go-karts and had a great time. The go-karts where great and the track layout was great. The staff was great. Great bang your buck.

name: James Lawley
text: Over priced but clean

name: Jahnisa Clay
text: We were having a blast!!!

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

name: Will Betts Jr.
text: Awesome experience at Urban Air at Trussville. We celebrated one of our boys birthday there and was blown away by the service of the staff, the food, and the activities. The kids, as well as the adults had a blast. The young manager and Josh constantly made sure we were taken care of. I highly recommend Urban Air at Trussville for a great fun family experience.

name: Sharee Lane
text: I was just here Saturday and my son was doing the rock wall and when the worker saw my son wanted to get on she ignored him at first and kept doing what she was doing. Now I saw earlier that she and another parent had a disagreement but when she finally hooked my son up she jerked him into and his neck jerked back. She should not have taken her frustrations out on my son and I immediately said something and she just looked at me with an “I don’t care face”. I don’t know what type of establishment this is but I will not be coming back if your workers are like this. I went up to the front desk to ask the young lady’s name and I was told that it was Katy bates.

name: Tamara Etheredge
text: More fun than I imagined.  Staff was incredible. The staff that helped with harnesses was super great with the kids and really cared.  Advice one staff member gave us is to have t shirts on the kids (girls had tank tops and complained of the harness around their necks).  Food prices were super reasonable.  Will be going back!!

name: Joel Carter
text: The place is fantastic and my daughter had an excellent time. What made it even better was how helpful the staff was in making sure that my daughter had the most enjoyable time playing there. They were even taking money out of their own wallets to help her play the claw machine game. Recommended fun for any age.

resp.text: Thank you!  We are glad you had a great experience.

name: Crystal Tindle
text: Great place and nice employees. Tons of fun for several hours

name: Ryan Evans
text: The front desk worker Tony was so cool and helped me get over my fear of riding the sky rider! He told me to close my eyes and pretend I’m a bird and it worked! I’m going to talk to my mom about getting me a memebership!!

name: Roxanne Corbett
text: My 14 year old son and his friends had a blast, but we weren't there just for him.  My husband and I participated too.  We had a great time and laughed so hard at each other.  It would be a great place to have a party as well.  We will be back!

name: David Lowry
text: You can have it.

name: Indigenous Squad
text: My kids love this place!! It has lots for them to do and the food is good. Prepare to spend some money though lol

name: Karima Ferguson (Re-Re)
text: It was fun and exciting. The kids really enjoyed there self.

name: Zee Smith
text: I had the best time ever at Urban Air! Great costumer service from Tony and Amelia. Dashya and Antwan took great care of me while putting on my harness. I will be coming back soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!  We are blessed to have the team members we have.

name: Laurine Piper
text: Wow so much to see and so much to do....we had 5 & 6 yr old children with us! Awesome and so much fun!

name: jill knestaut
text: Very clean and friendly place for family

name: Swooshi
text: Met this worker who’s name was Jerelle at the Ropes Course! Very hard worker, he’s very funny and he helped my kids get through out the whole course also!! Will definitely come here again in the near future!!

resp.text: Thank you!  Jerelle is awesome!  Come visit us again.

name: Don Smith
text: My children and their friends had a great time.  There were so many fun activities like climbing walls, rope courses, sky coaster, obstacle course, and a ton of trampoline related activities.  The staff was energetic and helpful.  More importantly, it was great exercise for the kids.  We are planning on going back as soon as possible.

name: Lashira Anthony
text: A little on the pricey side but a great family atmosphere

name: Jessica Cooper
text: Went here the for the first time ended up staying 3.5 hours had so much fun 😃

text: Nice and clean environment. My boys had a blast! The staff was friendly, the cashier at the snack bar was great and very helpful!!

text: This place is AWESOME!

text: A little on the pricey side but a great family atmosphere

name: Kenneth Davis
text:
The kids absolutely loved it. My 7year old son is terrified of heights, doesnt even let me pick him up on my shoulders but he loved the zip line.  We have been 5 times.  The best thing I enjoy is the Massage chairs. $5 for 15min, $10 for 30 and $20 for 1hr.  Go for the $20 :)  If your hungry the food is pretty good as well.

The rock wall is loads of fun.

resp.text: Awesome we can’t wait to see you again.

name: Benjamin Horton
text: This place is so much fun!  It’s not a trampoline park...it’s an adventure park that happens to have a bunch of trampolines.  The sky coaster and rock climbing walls are awesome, but they Ninja Course takes the cake!

name: Josh Nelson
text: The building was very clean with plenty of things to do. My kids had a great time. The only problem was that the workers played more than paying customers. If you are at work you need to work. It looks bad on a business when 4 workers are throwing a football around kids playing while telling each other they 'suck'.I will probably go to another urban air next time. You can not tell me they cant find any young people willing to work.We drove 50 min to get here. Kids left happy and I left disappointed.

Can u make the sky ryder faster and the ball pit why is it so deep?  You also seemed to be missing a few letters on the desk at the front of the store. But honestly great job!

text: This place is terrible unless you are of the age of 10 otherwise you cant jump or have fun because of the surplus of children there

name: Brittany Lil Bae Davis
text: My family and I always have a great time

name: Tasha Gray
text: Strike 1)over-priced $28.00per child regardless of age. Strike 2)only trampolines and jungle gyms for smaller kids, all the better activities are for at least kids 7&up. Strike 3)food was horrible!!cheese shouldn't taste buttery 🤢the 2 stars were for the nice employees.

name: Jadyn Jackson
text: Great place highly recommend! Concession staff was great on this busy Saturday

name: david calloway
text: Prices way to high

name: Oscar Cantillano
text: We had the pleasure of having my daughter’s 6th birthday party. The place is extremely nice and modern as far as a jump park goes. BJ the manager and staff were super friendly and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. I would recommend this place to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Oscar!  Come out and view our website for all of our specials!

name: Kalea Harrison
text: The staff at urban air was so amazing, Reyanna & Ryan were so kind to help me out when I fell and slint my knee. I will be back and hope to see these two amazing people again!!

name: Foster Stevens
text: My boys enjoy coming here to play.

name: Sherry Deaton
text: Had grandson's birthday party here today and it was awesome! The staff were amazing 😊Our party hostess Molly was phenomenal 😀She was so pleasant and helpful and a really hard worker ☺️ Would highly recommend a visit or party here!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Cecelia Braxton

text: Nice park really clean and there’s a lot of stuff to do here

text: Best place to jump thanks to the head man in charge Ryan !

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Ryan is awesome.  Please come out and visit us again.

name: Heather Payne
text: Tons of fun for ALL ages!! My son's 8th birthday party was jumping!! 🤾‍♂️🎂🤸‍♂️

name: Gina Emerson
text: Waited in line 20 minutes got up to counter and was asked did I go to kiosk to fill out info. Well no where are the signs indicating to do so I asked. Had to get out of line to fill out info, then paid at kiosk thinking now I wouldn't have to wait in line again. Wrong, had to get the socks you have to purchase. Took 35 minutes to get in. No supervision at play stations. No one to help at kiosks when it asks you to "dip" your credit card. Certainly not familiar with this computer term. Also toddlers are playing where big Kids are bc no staff monitoring anywhere. Water fountains don't work, wonder what's wrong with them?

resp.text: We are so sorry for your experience. We will ensure moving forward we have a better check in process.  Thank you for your feedback.

name: PAUL ROWSER
text: Reyanna was the greatest at concessions today and the food was amazing highly recommend

name: BJ Little
text: Great experience, my family,& I really enjoyed ourselves

name: stephanie martin
text: We had so much fun

name: Kristal Sullivan
text: Awesome place to have birthday parties

name: Kylie Higgins
text: I love it I had so much fun

name: Supremeclapz170_YT
text: THIS PLACE IS GREAT, never thought i could jump 10ft in the air, There are multiple places like this. But this place was by FAR THE BEST

name: Kim James
text:
Please do not let your kids ride in the air here!! Please do not enter the building while anyone is in the air!!!!!

PLEASE DO NOT LET YOUR KIDS RIDE ANY OF THE AIR ATTRACTIONS HERE WITHOUT BEING ADVISED THAT AN AIR ROPES COURSE RIDER WHO APPEARED TO BE STILL STRAPPED IN THE HARNESS FELL SEVERAL FEET JUST LAST FRIDAY 3/29/19, AND THE COMMUNITY IS NOT AWARE OF THIS.  Don't let it be your kid please!  PEOPLE SITTING DOWN ON THE GROUND BELOW WERE ALSO HARMED!!!!

This is important!! I'll repeat it.  If you plan to go and play it safe by not riding in the air, then this review is still for you and all of your family  because PEOPLE SITTING DOWN ON THE GROUND BELOW WERE ALSO HARMED!!!!

Please read on or call to try to find out for yourself before you go.  I don't want it to happen again to anyone!!  I've tried many times for a week now, but I can't reach any local or corporate officials with Urban Air to explain or calm our fears.  Who checks on these things?  Who answers to every parent that takes their kids to Urban Air?
It's Friday again and I'm trying not to scream at the thought that Urban Air Trampoline and Adventure Park in Trussville is still open (as far as I know) and still not answering any real questions about last Friday's horrific experience.   This wasn't your average bounce on the trampoline and break an ankle thing. This was a HORRIBLE NIGHTMARE that really happened to innocent people.   Urban Air, what's preventing it from happening again?

How do you drop a person from the sky?  Why did you drop her on top of a mom who was simply sitting on a bench below? It Was Horrible!!! There is so much more to say, but graphic details are not appropriate or important here.

I don't know if the other visitors there on Friday are just still too shaken up to talk about it.  Or just so relieved like us that their kid didn't fall.  Or maybe like me they hate to write online reviews (especially bad ones).  Well I would give Urban Air Trampoline Adventure Park in Trussville, Alabama negative 5 stars if I could, but I can't, so 1 horrible star.  Our little one has had a difficult time since he saw that horrible event on his last outing for Spring Break.  Thank goodness, he made it out ok.  Still, I'm so very sorry we chose  the Trussville Urban Air, but we knew other kids who enjoyed it there in the past.  I'm sorry to say we even teased a teenager who was too scared to ride, but he was wiser than us I guess.  We researched. We read the google reviews first. Obviously, not enough people write reviews.  We thought it was safe (trampoline park safe anyway).  We were wrong!   It's not even safe to sit on the benches and watch your babies.  And the lack of customer followup and consideration just adds to the mess.

Because of the layout of this Urban Air in Trussville, people on the ground are always under one of the air rides!  There should be a safety net or some type of separate area to keep kids above and kids and families below safe!!!!!!  We've visited Homewood Urban Air without a big problem. (Of course they don't have the air rope course and racer).

PLEASE DON'T LET ANYONE YOU LOVE (OR HATE) SIT OR WALK AROUND ANYWHERE IN THIS URBAN AIR LOCATION WHEN SOMEONE IS RIDING ANY AIR ATTRACTION (even with a harness)!!!

I hope this helps someone.  If you saw this, please speak up too and let people know.  It's time.  I can't believe the news didn't cover this.  I wish someone else said it sooner than me.  Every customer who was there Friday deserves answers, although not nearly as much as the injured victims.  We hope and pray they are alive and OK.  Every potential customer deserves answers so that it doesn't happen again.

Urban Air in Trussville, I don't see how you are still open and promoting Birthday packages. But since you are, PLEASE PROTECT YOUR PATRONS( that includes kids riding and also includes moms and babies sitting and watching below)!!   I hope you are at least answering and helping the people you seriously hurt last Friday.

resp.text: Hi Kim,This is Carolyn from the Corporate office. I just read your review this morning (Saturday, April 6th). If you would like to provide a phone number or email address for me to contact you, I can speak to you about your concerns. You may contact me at reviews@urbanairparks.com. My kiddos play at Urban Air Parks frequently and I can assure you safety is at the heart of everything we do. The Trussville Park closed the attraction you mentioned for a thorough inspection. I’m around if you want to talk, we consider our guests an extension of our family.Sincerely,Carolyn McLeanreviews@urbanairparks.comUrban Air’s Corporate Office

name: Shelby Jones
text: No organization... also stood in line for 45 minutes at the cafe while the staffed played around. 2nd from the front of the line and the card reader went down. Will not be back.

resp.text: We are so sorry about your experience.  We would love to have you out again to make up for your experience.  We had unforeseen issues with that card reader that morning.

text: Great place wish I could work here !

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We are so blessed to have Eric on our team.

text: Kids enjoyed it needs better food choice

name: Seth Pearson
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thank you!  We hope to see you again.

name: Kara Davenport
text: I took my kiddos here today for toddler time and we had a blast! We evacuated from North Carolina for the hurricane and it's been hard on my kids. The staff was amazing! Helped and played with my kiddos and the owner was very supportive and very generous! There's a playground obstacle course and a ninja warrior type area with a ball pit that my kids loved! They also had a wipeout spinner that is great for luring your kids in to nap time! The youngest loved jumping on every trampoline in the place! Lol All in all, our experience was amazing and we are heading back tomorrow. I wish we lived here! Trussville is very lucky! I can't say enough great things! Thank you Urban Air!
